Use Effective bubbles for Effectual's chest bubble effect
yacl3.config.vcc:vcc_config.bubblePot.de: Use Effective bubbles for Effectual's pot bubble effect
yacl3.config.vcc:vcc_config.bubbleBreath: Use Effective's bubbles for Effectual's breath bubble effect

yacl3.config.vcc:vcc_config.mouthSteam.d: Replace Effectual's mouth steam with a modified cascade particle from Effective
